s.text: It is true though that the Internet is well-suited to these nefarious tasks with its ability to reach out to more easy marks.
I don't know if Amazon can ever make the kind of money that will justify its lofty stock price, although it certainly seems adept at spending cash.

It is true though that the Internet is well-suited to these nefarious tasks with its ability to reach out to more easy marks.
